divs: Sighting DetailsOn Feb 27th 2013 at 8pm my Daughter called me and said thet there was sonmething stange going on at their house she could not explain, she said come quick Mama I do not know what is going and it is scaring me badly,she said it had been going on about 10mins before she called me so I jumped in my truck and hurried over to their house which was about 15mins from me I had my neice with me I told her to keep watch on the sky toward her cousins house , I was traving west bound on 70hwy but had to watch my speed so as not to go too fast.just as we got close to my daughter house my niece saw a large light in the sky changing colors and then would disapprear from sight then reapprear.as I turned on their road I could not see the large light any more,so I hurried to their house they were in the yard and she was very upset and so was my son-in-law they began to decribed what they had seen.My son-in-law was in his barn when he heard a very loud noise out side he went to see what it was when he cleared the barn door he look at the trees behine his barn and just tree top level he saw an object he decribe as beinga very large airplane shaped,he said it tilted as if it saw him and then tilted back the other way he was so scared he thought it was going to crash he ran back in the barn then the noise stopped , he come back out of his barn to see it as it cleared the tree tops next to their house is a field he said it went to ground level but did not touch the ground and the noise stopped from that craft, then there was another load noise and there was another craft just like the one in the field as it got close to the other one in the field the noise stopped .he then ran inside the house to tell my daughter but she was on the front pourch looking at them too , he come back on the back deck to see them as they flew away very low and slient at this time ,my daughter noticed that their next door neighbors were out side seeing what they saw too ,their neighbors jumped in their trucks and followed the crafts , just as they left my son-in-maw said he heard another load noise behine him and there was another craft just like the other two but not as low as the other two were, the 3 large air plane shaped crafts glided toward 70hwy making no noise at all, my daughter notice that all the dogs in the neighbhood were barking loudly , I got there to lateto see anything as we stood out in their yard looking at the sky we could hear jets from the near by air force base loacted in Goldsboro, NC were in the air and flying very funny they usually fly 2 at a time close to each other but these were all over the air space , none were flying toward where my daughter and son-in-law had seen the crafts flown toward. we stood out side for about 2 hours but did not see anything anymore I told my daughter that she needed to have gotten some pics or video of this event so we would have proof but she was so scared she said that she did not think of that, so me and my niece went back home , my other daughter said the next morning that she has seen on the late news on channel 11 that there were unexplained lights and crafts seen by many over Smithfield and Selma NC that night between 8 and 10pm but nothing else was said about it on any other news station.
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
